results.title: A Randomized Phase II Study of Irinotecan Plus Cisplatin with or without Simvastatin in Ever-Smokers with Extended Disease Small Cell Lung Cancer
results.text_hl: ...Addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to chemotherapy provided no survival benefit in ever-smokers with @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@ED-SCLC@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee Y, Lee SH, Lee GK, Lim EJ, Han JY. A Randomized Phase II Study of Irinotecan Plus Cisplatin with or without Simvastatin in Ever-Smokers with Extended Disease Small Cell Lung Cancer Cancer Res Treat. 2023 Mar 20;():. PMID: 36960628

results.title: Preclinical Activity of Simvastatin Induces Cell Cycle Arrest in G1 via Blockade of Cyclin D-Cdk4 Expression in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
results.text_hl: In this study, an @CHEMICAL_monooxyethylene_trimethylolpropane_tristearate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C070243 @@@MTT@@@ assay revealed the cytotoxic activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ against @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@large cell lung cancer@@@ (@DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@Non-small cell lung cancer@@@; @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@NSCLC@@@) cells (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0459 @@@NCI-H460@@@); however, induced apoptosis was not observed in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0459 @@@NCI-H460@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Liang YW, Chang CC, Hung CM, Chen TY, Huang TY, Hsu YC. Preclinical Activity of Simvastatin Induces Cell Cycle Arrest in G1 via Blockade of Cyclin D-Cdk4 Expression in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Int J Mol Sci. 2013 Mar 12;14(3):5806-16. PMID: 23481641

results.title: Potent inhibition of small-cell lung cancer cell growth by simvastatin reveals selective functions of Ras isoforms in growth factor signalling.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@SCLC tumour@@@ growth in vivo was inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: A phase 2 study of irinotecan, cisplatin, and simvastatin for untreated extensive-disease small cell lung cancer.
results.text_hl: A phase 2 study of @CHEMICAL_Irinotecan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077146 @@@irinotecan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for untreated extensive-disease @<m>DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small cell lung cancer@@@.
